text: Fort Lee may refer to: * Fort Lee, New Jersey, a Borough in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States ** Koreatown, Fort Lee, an ethnic Korean enclave in the above borough ** Battle of Fort Lee, fought on November 20, 1776 between American and British forces * Fort Lee (Salem, Massachusetts), a historic site that was an American Revolution fort * Fort Lee (Virginia), a census- designated place and a United States Army post in Prince George County, Virginia, United States * SS Fort Lee, a World War II tanker ship
title: Fort Lee
